clinical_study.brief_title: Skin Health in Young Adults - Preventing Indoor Tanning and Promoting Sun Protection
clinical_study.official_title: Skin Health in Young Adults - Preventing Indoor Tanning and Promoting Sun Protection

brief_summary.textblock: This is a pilot randomized controlled trial of an Internet-based skin cancer prevention intervention as compared to a standard of care control in 80 non-Hispanic white females ages 20-30.

primary_outcome.measure: Intention to indoor tan in next year
primary_outcome.description: Indoor tanning intentions are measured on a scale that ranges from 1 (definitely do not intend to indoor tan) to 7 (definitely do intend to indoor tan).

primary_outcome.measure: Intention to indoor tan in next year
primary_outcome.description: Indoor tanning intentions are measured on a scale that ranges from 1 (definitely do not intend to indoor tan) to 7 (definitely do intend to indoor tan).

primary_outcome.measure: Intention to indoor tan in next year
primary_outcome.description: Indoor tanning intentions are measured on a scale that ranges from 1 (definitely do not intend to indoor tan) to 7 (definitely do intend to indoor tan).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of indoor tanning sessions in the previous 3 months
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of number of times indoor tanned, reported retrospectively for the preceding 3 months.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of indoor tanning sessions in the previous 3 months
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of number of times indoor tanned, reported retrospectively for the preceding 3 months.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of indoor tanning sessions in the previous 3 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: From 12 Weeks (first Follow-up) to 24 Weeks (Second Follow-up)
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of number of times indoor tanned, reported retrospectively for the preceding 3 months.

secondary_outcome.measure: Intention to sunbathe outdoors in the next year
secondary_outcome.description: Sunbathing intentions are measured on a scale that ranges from 1 (definitely do not intend to indoor tan) to 7 (definitely do intend to indoor tan).

secondary_outcome.measure: Intention to sunbathe outdoors in the next year
secondary_outcome.description: Sunbathing intentions are measured on a scale that ranges from 1 (definitely do not intend to indoor tan) to 7 (definitely do intend to indoor tan).

secondary_outcome.measure: Intention to sunbathe outdoors in the next year
secondary_outcome.description: Sunbathing intentions are measured on a scale that ranges from 1 (definitely do not intend to indoor tan) to 7 (definitely do intend to indoor tan).

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of outdoor sunbathing sessions in the previous 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of number of times sunbathed, reported retrospectively for the preceding 3 months.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of outdoor sunbathing sessions in the previous 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of number of times sunbathed, reported retrospectively for the preceding 3 months.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of outdoor sunbathing sessions in the previous 3 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 12 Weeks (first Follow-up) to 24 Weeks (Second Follow-up)
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of number of times sunbathed, reported retrospectively for the preceding 3 months.

arm_group.description: Web-based intervention modules to discourage tanning.

General information regarding UV protection measures through an online Qualtrics interface. Content will mirror information provided in brochures typically available in a dermatology office or through skin cancer prevention websites.

intervention.description: 6 Web-based modules that focus on preventing skin cancer through sun protection and indoor tanning reduction using the Theory of Planned Behavior and Prospect Theory
One website with content similar to those available in dermatology offices on skin cancer prevention

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Tanned indoors in past 12 months
- Able to communicate well in English
- Reliable Internet access
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of skin cancer (self-report)
